item.description:
Brief Vitae

Since
12/2022
Postdoc fellow
The Weizmann Institute of Science
At Yuval Oreg's group.
10/2023 - 01/2024: Research stay at The Neils Bohr Institute with Karsten Flensberg.
12/2022
04/2018
PhD in nanophysics
Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
Supervised by Elsa Prada and Alftredo Levy Yeyati.
11/2021 - 04/2022: Research stay at The Weizmann Institute of Science with Yuval Oreg.
03/2018
12/2017
Research assistant
IFIMAC, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
Project led by Alftredo Levy Yeyati and Hermann Suderow.
06/2017
09/2016
Master's degree in Condensed matter physics
Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
Specialization in nanophysics.
05/2016
09/2008
Professional grade in music
Conservatory of Alcalá de Henares
Major in piano and composition.

Languages

Note: Some of the posters and talks were presented in conferences before their corresponding work was published. Hence, the files may contain incorrect or incomplete information.

Scientific publications

05/2025
Phase-controlled minimal Kitaev chain in multiterminal Josephson junctions
Samuel D. Escribano, Anders Enevold Dahl, Karsten Flensberg and Yuval Oreg.
Phys. Rev. B 111, 195433 (2025); ArXiv:2501.14597.
03/2025
Intertwined topological phases in TaAs2 nanowires with giant magnetoresistance and quantum coherent surface transport
Anand Roy, Anna Eyal, Roni Majlin Skiff, Barun Barick, Samuel D. Escribano, Olga Brontvein, Katya Rechav, Ora Bitton, Roni Ilan, Ernesto Joselevich.
Adv. Mater. -, 2418279 (2025); ArXiv:2411.15974.
02/2025
InP/GaSb core-shell nanowires: A novel hole-based platform with strong spin-orbit coupling for full-shell hybrid devices
Andrea Vezzosi, Carlos Payá, Paweł Wójcik, Andrea Bertoni, Guido Goldoni, Elsa Prada and Samuel D. Escribano.
SciPost Phys. 18, 069 (2025); ArXiv:2405.07651.
09/2024
Spectroscopic Visualization of Hard Quasi-1D Superconductivity Induced in Nanowires Deposited on a Quasi-2D Indium film
Ambikesh Gupta, Pranab Kumar Nag, Shai Kiriati, Samuel D. Escribano, Man Suk Song, Hadas Shtrikman, Yuval Oreg, Nurit Avraham, Haim Beidenkopf.
ArXiv:2409.19736.
03/2024
Phenomenology of Majorana zero modes in full-shell hybrid nanowires
Carlos Payá, Samuel D. Escribano, Andrea Vezzosi, Fernando Peñaranda, Ramón Aguado, Pablo San-Jose and Elsa Prada.
Physical Review B 109, 115428 (2024); ArXiv:2312.11613.
11/2023
Suppression of thermal smearing in a feedback-driven atomic size Josephson junction
Samuel D. Escribano, Víctor Barrena, David Perconte, Jose Antonio Moreno, Marta Fernández Lomana, Miguel Águeda, Edwin Herrera, Beilun Wu, Jose Gabriel Rodrigo, Elsa Prada, Isabel Guillamón, Alfredo Levy Yeyati and Hermann Suderow.
ArXiv:2311.12783.
08/2022
Semiconductor-ferromagnet-superconductor planar heterostructures for 1D topological superconductivity
Samuel D. Escribano, Andrea Maiani, Martin Leijnse, Karsten Flensberg, Yuval Oreg, Alfredo Levy Yeyati, Elsa Prada and Rubén Seoane Souto.
Npj Quantum Materials 7, 81 (2022); ArXiv:2203.06644.
01/2022
Fluxoid-induced pairing suppression and near-zero modes in quantum dots coupled to full-shell nanowires
Samuel D. Escribano, Alfredo Levy Yeyati, Ramón Aguado, Elsa Prada and Pablo San-Jose.
Physical Review B 105, 045418 (2022); ArXiv:2107.13011.
07/2021
Tunable proximity effects and topological superconductivity in ferromagnetic hybrid nanowires
Samuel D. Escribano, Alfredo Levy Yeyati, Yuval Oreg and Elsa Prada.
Physical Review B 104, L041404 (2021); ArXiv:2011.06566.
08/2020
Improved effective equation for the Rashba spin-orbit coupling in semiconductor nanowires
Samuel D. Escribano, Alfredo Levy Yeyati and Elsa Prada.
Physical Review Research 2, 033264 (2020); ArXiv:2001.04375.
07/2019
Effects of the electrostatic environment on superlattice Majorana nanowires
Samuel D. Escribano, Alfredo Levy Yeyati, Yuval Oreg and Elsa Prada.
Physical Review B 100, 045301 (2019); ArXiv:1904.10289.
08/2018
Interaction-induced zero-energy pinning and quantum dot formation in Majorana nanowires
Samuel D. Escribano, Alfredo Levy Yeyati and Elsa Prada.
Beilstein J. Nanotechnology 9, 2171-2180 (2018); ArXiv:1712.07625.
